passives.name: Meltdown (Chant) Extension
passives.desc:
Meltdown (Chant) use +1

When using Meltdown (Chant):
 â€¢ Slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 â€¢ Slight MAX BRV Up effect boost

When using Meltdown+:
 â€¢ Additional magic  PG attack before  PF attack
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Increases special effect Magic by 5 (limit 9)

While special effect Magic at least 5:
 â€¢ Meltdown+ becomes Magic Meltdown+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets; consumes 4 special effect Magic instead of increasing by 5)

While special effect Magic at least 1:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; increases special effect Magic by 3 [limit 9])
passives.short_desc: Meltdown (Chant) Extension: Boost to Meltdown (Chant)

passives.name: Buffed Initial Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises INT BRVã€? MAX BRV with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Initial Boost: Raises INT BRVã€? MAX BRV

passives.name: Meteor (Chant) Extension
passives.desc:
Meteor (Chant) use +1

When using Meteor+:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 15; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Increases special effect Magic by 5 (limit 9)

While special effect Magic at least 5:
 â€¢ Meteor+ becomes Magic Meteor+ ( PG attack becomes group attack; moderate cumulative BRV damage boost; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; consumes 4 special effect Magic instead of increasing by 5)

While special effect Magic at least 1:
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (magic  PG attack +  PF attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; increases special effect Magic by 3 [limit 9])
passives.short_desc: Meteor (Chant) Extension: Boost to Meteor (Chant)

passives.name: Destruction Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRVã€? ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Brilliance: Raises MAX BRVã€? ATK

passives.name: Set Magic Boost Extension
passives.desc: When using Set Magic Boost:\n â€¢ Slight raised MAX BRV boost
passives.short_desc: Set Magic Boost Extension: Boost to Set Magic Boost

passive.desc:
Set Magic Boost use +1

When using Set Magic Boost:
 â€¢ Magic granted +2
passive.short_desc: Set Magic Boost Growth: Boost to Set Magic Boost

passive.desc:

 â€¢ Increases BRV Ã— 1.2

 â€¢ ATK Up duration+

 â€¢ BRV damage boost

passive.name: Dark Maiden's Power
